title: RIOT play with me on my birthday?
body: Tomorrow, November 4th, is my 20th birthday, it would be pretty cool if someone from RIOT would play a game or 2 with me :D

replies.body: Man that would be pretty rad. Would go along way to show customer relations too.
Swiggity swooty, will they be coming for the booty?
DW I bet a RIOT of people would like to play with you
Rito doesn't converse with the community anymore, not since the chinese overlords bought their company.
